comments.body: what does "existing 2, new 1" mean? Can we fix this error message?

> what does "existing 2, new 1" mean? Can we fix this error message?

That's just the error from my test harness.  It would actually present the error from the `Update` method on the `RESTStorage`.

> That's just the error from my test harness. It would actually present the error from the Update method on the RESTStorage.

See https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/14758/files#diff-da29c957e269e71370169d7c6619eff6R54

Oh ok that's fine then.

It's just the test hardness that doesn't do that.
